alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orleans; Plaquemines; St. Bernard; St. Charles (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 1:20AM CST until January 09 at 2:15AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Central St. Charles Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 215 AM CST. * At 120 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Metairie to near Bayou Gauche, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Avondale, Metairie, Hahnville, Marrero, Harvey, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Lake Catherine, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte, Ama, and Destrehan. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 215 and 256. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; Orleans; Plaquemines; St. Bernard; St. Charles
